Features.RenderedEffects.Description: Provides Quality of Life tweaks for various rendered effects.
Features.RenderedEffects.Dialogue.Title: Rendered Effects Settings
Features.RenderedEffects.Dialogue.lblCam: Toggles the game being able to shake the camera without player input.
Features.RenderedEffects.Dialogue.lblClo: Toggles the rendering of clouds. [Requires Re-log]
Features.RenderedEffects.Dialogue.lblDus: Toggles the rendering of dust particle effects.
Features.RenderedEffects.Dialogue.lblFog: Toggles the rendering of fog effects.
Features.RenderedEffects.Dialogue.lblGli: Toggles the rendering of the glitch effect that comes with Temporal Storms.
Features.RenderedEffects.Dialogue.lblHai: Toggles the rendering of hailstone particle effects.
Features.RenderedEffects.Dialogue.lblLig: Toggles the rendering of lightning flashing light effects.
Features.RenderedEffects.Dialogue.lblRai: Toggles the rendering of raindrop particle effects.
Features.RenderedEffects.Dialogue.lblSno: Toggles the rendering of snowflake particle effects.
